16class ArrayBufferExtension;
17class InstructionStream;
18class DescriptorArray;
19class EphemeronHashTable;

28// Note: In general it is preferred to use the macros defined in
29// object-macros.h.
30
31// Combined write barriers.
32void WriteBarrierForCode(Tagged<InstructionStream> host, RelocInfo* rinfo,
33 Tagged<Object> value,
34 WriteBarrierMode mode = UPDATE_WRITE_BARRIER);
35void WriteBarrierForCode(Tagged<InstructionStream> host, RelocInfo* rinfo,
36 Tagged<HeapObject> value,
37 WriteBarrierMode mode = UPDATE_WRITE_BARRIER);
38
39void CombinedWriteBarrier(Tagged<HeapObject> object, ObjectSlot slot,
40 Tagged<Object> value, WriteBarrierMode mode);
41void CombinedWriteBarrier(Tagged<HeapObject> object, MaybeObjectSlot slot,
42 Tagged<MaybeObject> value, WriteBarrierMode mode);
43
44void CombinedWriteBarrier(HeapObjectLayout* object, TaggedMemberBase* slot,
45 Tagged<Object> value, WriteBarrierMode mode);
46
47void CombinedEphemeronWriteBarrier(Tagged<EphemeronHashTable> object,
48 ObjectSlot slot, Tagged<Object> value,
49 WriteBarrierMode mode);
50void IndirectPointerWriteBarrier(Tagged<HeapObject> host,
51 IndirectPointerSlot slot,
52 Tagged<HeapObject> value,
53 WriteBarrierMode mode);
54
55// Generational write barrier.
56void GenerationalBarrierForCode(Tagged<InstructionStream> host,
57 RelocInfo* rinfo, Tagged<HeapObject> object);
58
59inline bool IsReadOnlyHeapObject(Tagged<HeapObject> object);
60
61class V8_EXPORT_PRIVATE WriteBarrier {
62 public:
63 static inline void Marking(Tagged<HeapObject> host, ObjectSlot,
64 Tagged<Object> value);
65 static inline void Marking(Tagged<HeapObject> host, HeapObjectSlot,
66 Tagged<HeapObject> value);
67 static inline void Marking(Tagged<HeapObject> host, MaybeObjectSlot,
68 Tagged<MaybeObject> value);
69 static inline void Marking(Tagged<InstructionStream> host, RelocInfo*,
70 Tagged<HeapObject> value);
71 static inline void Marking(Tagged<JSArrayBuffer> host, ArrayBufferExtension*);
72 static inline void Marking(Tagged<DescriptorArray>,
73 int number_of_own_descriptors);
74 static inline void Marking(Tagged<HeapObject> host, IndirectPointerSlot slot);
75 static inline void Marking(Tagged<TrustedObject> host,
76 ProtectedPointerSlot slot,
77 Tagged<TrustedObject> value);
78
79 static inline void Shared(Tagged<InstructionStream> host, RelocInfo*,
80 Tagged<HeapObject> value);
81
82 // It is invoked from generated code and has to take raw addresses.
83 static int MarkingFromCode(Address raw_host, Address raw_slot);
84 static int IndirectPointerMarkingFromCode(Address raw_host, Address raw_slot,
85 Address raw_tag);
86 static int SharedMarkingFromCode(Address raw_host, Address raw_slot);
87 static int SharedFromCode(Address raw_host, Address raw_slot);
88
89 // Invoked from global handles where no host object is available.
90 static inline void MarkingFromGlobalHandle(Tagged<Object> value);
91
92 static inline void CombinedBarrierFromInternalFields(Tagged<JSObject> host,
93 void* value);
94 static inline void CombinedBarrierFromInternalFields(Tagged<JSObject> host,
95 size_t argc,
96 void** values);
97
98 static inline void MarkingFromCppHeapWrappable(Tagged<JSObject> host,
99 void* value);
100
101 static MarkingBarrier* SetForThread(MarkingBarrier*);
102
103 static MarkingBarrier* CurrentMarkingBarrier(
104 Tagged<HeapObject> verification_candidate);
105
106#ifdef ENABLE_SLOW_DCHECKS
107 template <typename T>
108 static inline bool IsRequired(Tagged<HeapObject> host, T value);
109 template <typename T>
110 static inline bool IsRequired(const HeapObjectLayout* host, T value);
111 static bool IsImmortalImmovableHeapObject(Tagged<HeapObject> object);
112#endif
113
114 static void MarkingSlow(Tagged<HeapObject> host, HeapObjectSlot,
115 Tagged<HeapObject> value);
116
117 private:
118 static inline bool IsMarking(Tagged<HeapObject> object);
119
120 static void MarkingSlow(Tagged<InstructionStream> host, RelocInfo*,
121 Tagged<HeapObject> value);
122 static void MarkingSlow(Tagged<JSArrayBuffer> host, ArrayBufferExtension*);
123 static void MarkingSlow(Tagged<DescriptorArray>,
124 int number_of_own_descriptors);
125 static void MarkingSlow(Tagged<HeapObject> host, IndirectPointerSlot slot);
126 static void MarkingSlow(Tagged<TrustedObject> host, ProtectedPointerSlot slot,
127 Tagged<TrustedObject> value);
128 static void MarkingSlowFromGlobalHandle(Tagged<HeapObject> value);
129 static void MarkingSlowFromInternalFields(Heap* heap, Tagged<JSObject> host);
130 static void MarkingSlowFromCppHeapWrappable(Heap* heap, void* object);
131
132 static inline void GenerationalBarrierFromInternalFields(
133 Tagged<JSObject> host, void* value);
134 static inline void GenerationalBarrierFromInternalFields(
135 Tagged<JSObject> host, size_t argc, void** values);
136
137 static void SharedSlow(Tagged<InstructionStream> host, RelocInfo*,
138 Tagged<HeapObject> value);
139
140 friend class Heap;
141};
142
143} // namespace internal
144} // namespace v8
